People To People

MEMO OF UNDERSTANDING / SALES AGREEMENT

CDA Delegation

February 19-22, 2023

  

PASSPORT AND VISA:

All travelers are required to carry a valid passport and a Cuban visa. Those without a valid passport and visa will not be allowed to enter. Travelers who were born in Cuba may require a special visa in order to enter the country. Passport should be valid for a minimum of 6 months after departure date. You may obtain a visa from CET or the airline and CET will advise on the process.

 

IMPORTANT:

Your trip is designed and implanted to comply with U.S. regulations on travel to Cuba as well as local laws in Cuba. Cuba Educational Travel is not responsible for violations as a result of travelers ignoring advice, altering programs on the ground or breaking Cuban law.

MEMO OF UNDERSTANDING / SALES AGREEMENT

YPO Arizona:  Forum Retreat

April 24-27, 2024

 

 

Package Price*: $3,800 per person   

 

*Pricing is listed as per person and based on a minimum of 7 passengers

 

Ground package includes:

  • 4 nights’ accommodations in Havana, Cuba (Apr 24-27, 2024)
  • Daily breakfast
  • All activities, speaker fees, live entertainment, and event production as described on the program
  • Dedicated professional guides
  • Local ground transportation to and from all activities listed on program
  • All meals listed on program
  • Pre-trip departure information
  • Compliance with U.S. Treasury Department regulations
  • Cuban visas

 

Ground package does not include:

  • Airfare
  • Personal hotel incidentals
  • Meals, activities, or additional events not listed on the program
  • Tips for hotel staff, guides, drivers, etc.

 

 

TERMS AND CONDITIONS                                                                                                        

 

PAYMENT:

  • A signed copy of the Memorandum of Understanding should be turned in with the deposit.
  • A deposit of $1,000 per person is due no later than December 24, 2023. Early deposits are encouraged to lock in your spot and reserve your preferred lodging.
  • Final payments are due no later than 90 days prior to trip departure, January 24, 2024.
  • Please inquire if you are interested in purchasing trip insurance from a certified, third party.

 

Payment can be made with a check, cashier’s check, or money order. Credit cards are not accepted. Checks should be made out to Cuba Educational Travel and mailed to:

 

Cuba Educational Travel

Attn. YPO Arizona Forum – April 2024

136 Sequams Lane W.

West Islip, NY 11795

 

CANCELLATION and REPLACEMENT POLICIES:

  • The sale is considered final.
  • Cancellations made on or before December 31, 2023 are eligible for a full refund.
  • Cancellations made between January 1, 2024 and February 1, 2024 are eligible for a 50% refund.
  • Cancellations made on or after February 2, 2024 days of trip departure are nonrefundable.
  • In some instances, time permitting, a different traveler can take the place of a scheduled participant for a processing fee of $350.

 

Due to financial transaction limitations stemming from OFAC’s embargo on Cuba, the trip is non-refundable. We recommend Allianz Global Travel Insurance - specifically their Classic with RTW (Requirement to Work - allows you to cancel for work related reasons), Premier Plan or Classic with Cancel Anytime. The plans are based on individuals - so each member will need to purchase their own plan to cover their own per person trip cost.

 

UNUSED SERVICES & REFUNDS:

No refund or adjustment can be made for any portion of the services not used such as voluntary non-usage of hotel accommodations, scheduled meals or any planned activity described in your itinerary.

 

PASSPORT AND VISA:

All travelers are required to carry a valid passport and a Cuban visa. The visa will be completed by a Cuba Educational Travel representative and sent to the trip leader beforehand.

 

IMPORTANT:

Those without a valid passport will not be allowed to enter. Passport should be valid for a minimum of 6 months after departure date. Cuba Educational Travel is not responsible for lost or stolen passports in Cuba.
